inclusion.criterion: Severe closed traumatic brain injury diagnosed in the clinic
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Blood glucose levels > 7.0 mmol/L measured twice by rapid examination within 2 hours of hospital admission
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At the age of 18 - 80 years old
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: At the age of < 18 years old or > 80 years old
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has had previous episodes of diabetic ketoacidosis, but is currently well and not experiencing any nausea or vomiting.
